name: Music Star - Build Your Music Career
name_original: Music Star - Build Your Music Career
description:
(AD FREE) Will you stack up against the world's greatest musicians? Create chart topping hits, land record deals, and more! Will you be the next MUSIC STAR? 

---------------------------

Less than 1% of musicians make it on the path to super stardom! Start at the bottom of the music world and climb the ladder of fame as you create chart topping hits, negotiate record deals and create a musical legacy!

• Create and release songs

• Strategically choose album marketing and pricing for successful releases

• Level up your own studio to eventually run your own label

• Plan music tours at some of the world's biggest venues

• Work with popular artists on hit tracks

• Negotiate deals with record labels

• Create your own label and manage your artists (coming soon)

• Track your monthly listeners, earn revenue per stream and manage your music empire

• Expand your horizons and become an investor in early stage companies

• Grow your wealth with investment properties

• Global leaderboards
